questions.text: What is the name of Lois' sister?
questions.explanation:
Carol.

	Carol is nine months pregnant with her child and her husband just walked out on her, so Peter and Lois go to help her.

questions.text: Who takes care of the kids while Lois and Peter are away?
options: No one.  They stay home alone
questions.explanation:
Quagmire.

	Quagmire has never looked after kids before, so he tries hard to impress them.  He tells the kids to go on a scavenger hunt.

questions.text: What is not on Quagmire's scavenger hunt list?
options: A speed limit sign that doesn't end in five or zero
questions.explanation:
A jar of pickles.

	Chris collects all of the items first and he won the pencil and speed limit sign.  Quagmire puts the hair into a shrine for Lois.

questions.text: Does Lois' sister give birth to a boy or a girl?
questions.explanation:
boy.

	Peter has to deliver the baby after the real doctor sticks his hand into a box of used syringes.  This makes Peter want another child.

questions.text: What pet did Peter and Lois once own?
questions.explanation:
Rock.

	Peter and Lois ended up storing the pet rock away in a box of Meg, Chris, and Stewie's baby books.

questions.text: Upon entering Peter, how many minutes does Stewie have upon ship re-expansion?
questions.explanation:
Thirty.

	Stewie goes into Peter in a micro-sized ship and destroys Peter's sperm with lasers.

questions.text: Does Stewie succeed in destroying all of Peter's sperm?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Stewie fights a possible brother inside his ship until he realizes that his brother also has the same views on killing Lois.

questions.text: Do Peter and Lois have another baby?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Lois and Peter decide that Stewie was enough work, and that they would like to spend more time together.  Stewie's attempts at preventing Peter and Lois from having a baby were basically useless.

questions.text: What is one method Stewie doesn't use to stop Lois and Peter from having another child?
questions.correct: Lock Peter out of the house
questions.explanation:
Lock Peter out of the house.

	Stewie ends up using very high-tech gadgets to prevent Peter and Lois from having a baby, and usually had no idea when they would try.

questions.text: Who doesn't appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Bonnie.

	Adam West appears at the hospital because his leg is asleep, and Peter tells Quagmire, Joe, and Cleveland about having the baby.
